data: {"concept_id": "voice_no_shame", "concept_name": "Voice (Part 7)", "set": "Narrative/Voice", "type": "element", "definition": "Keep the hot core alive by separating embarrassment from weakness and refusing cool armor.", "axes": "embarrassment_signal|draft_policy|cool_armor|ownership", "axis_values": "turn_on|cry|petty|tender|fetish|revenge | let_it_live|sand_it_down|hide_in_irony | none|light|heavy | disowned|admitted|weaponized", "source_file": "Voice Part 7.md", "source_md5": "4b740821901afeb77cd29a5d9762db69", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:11:05.628623Z"}
